item.description:
It is said that variety is the spice of life.  Well, if you come to this jumbo lunch, you can enjoy both variety and spice, not to mention networking and conversation with your Tufts colleagues.  So, live it up by joining us at Yak & Yeti, a Nepali & Indian restuarant in Ball Square for a delicious luncheon buffet for less than ten bucks. The buffet options boast a variety of tastes from different regions of Nepal and India made with only the freshest ingredients and catering to both vegetarians and carnivores alike.

As always, please feel free to forward this invitation to any colleages who might like to join us.  If you have any questions, please contact me at rich.kelley@tufts.edu or for specific questions about the restaurant or menu, you can contact Yak & Yeti directly at 617-284-6227 or via email at amrit.thakali@yahoo.com.

I look forward to dining with you.

Rich Kelley

Budget & Fiscal Officer

School of Arts & Sciences
item.how_to_find_us: Tufts Faculy & Staff Meet-up Signs on our table(s)
item.name: Jumbo Lunch: Yak & Yeti Restaurant
